; Clear and default to just combine
d$a2000160
d$a2010100
d$a2020160
d$a2030100
d$0
^-$01

; Just XOR all palettes
d$a2000160
d$a20101f0
d$a2020160
d$a20301f0
d$0
^-$01

; XOR and AND
d$a2000161
d$a2010100
d$a2020162
d$a2030100
d$0
^-$01

; Both OR
d$a2000163
d$a2010100
d$a2020163
d$a2030100
d$0
^-$01



; Test combinator being updated mid-frame
d$0
w$ff01ff00,$40000000

d$a2000160
d$a2010100
d$a2020161
d$a2030100

d$0
w$ff01ff00,$50000000

d$a2000162
d$a2010100
d$a2020163
d$a2030100

d$0
w$ff01ff00,$60000000

d$a2000160
d$a2010180
d$a2020161
d$a2030180

d$0
w$ff01ff00,$70000000

d$0

d$a2000161
d$a2010100
d$a2020162
d$a2030100


; With dithering
d$0
w$ff01ff00,$80000000

d$a2000164
d$a2010100
d$a2020165
d$a2030100

d$0
w$ff01ff00,$90000000

d$a2000166
d$a2010100
d$a2020167
d$a2030100

d$0
w$ff01ff00,$a0000000

d$a2000164
d$a2010180
d$a2020165
d$a2030180

d$0
w$ff01ff00,$b0000000

d$0

d$a2000164
d$a2010100
d$a2020166
d$a2030100


d$0
^-$01

; Then back to normal combine operation
d$a2000160
d$a2010100
d$a2020160
d$a2030100
